Silver Fire.name: Silver Fire
Silver Fire.flavor: You summon a jet of pure magical power that burns through all defenses and empowers your other spells.
Silver Fire.onHit: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier damage, and until the end of the encounter, each subsequent time you hit the target with an attack, it takes additional damage equal to onehalf your level.

Synostodweomer.name: Synostodweomer
Synostodweomer.flavor: You heal yourself with the ethereal silver fire of pure magic.
Synostodweomer.target: You or one ally within 20 squares
Synostodweomer.effect: Spend one of your own healing surges but regain no hit points. The target of the spell can then spend a healing surge. (If you are the target, you will have spent two healing surges to regain hit points for one surge.)

Simbul's Tempest.name: Simbul's Tempest
Simbul's Tempest.flavor: You create a powerful telekinetic storm to pummel your foes. Your arcane wrath transports you in a blaze of silver fire, burning away our mortal frailty.
Simbul's Tempest.onHit: 5d10 force damage. After you finish all attack rolls for this power, for every enemy you hit, you can immediately roll one saving throw against an effect that a save can end. You can roll multiple saving throws against a single effect that a save can end if your first attempts fail.
Simbul's Tempest.onMiss: Half damage, and you gain no extra saving throws.
